content: is there such a thing as  \"Easy\" API to get price distribution for an eBay (keyword) search??

Yes, eBay provides an API called the eBay Finding API which allows developers to retrieve data on eBay listings, including prices. This API can be used to search for listings based on keywords and retrieve price information for those listings. However, it is important to note that working with APIs typically requires some level of programming skills and understanding of how to make API requests.
